snippet: On HealthTap, an interactive Web site, users can ask for medical advice, and doctors can gain whimsical “awards” for their answers.
abstract: Randall Stross Digital Domain column highlights HealthTap, an interactive Web site where users can ask for free medical advice, and doctors can earn recognition and whimsical 'awards' for their answers; site, which offers some social network features, says it has signed up more than 9,000 physicians and is adding 100 daily.
lead_paragraph: On HealthTap, an interactive Web site, users can ask for medical advice, and doctors can gain whimsical “awards” for their answers.

headline.seo: On HealthTap, Advice for You and Points for Doctors
headline.main: Advice for the Ill, and Points for the Doctors
headline.print_headline: Advice for the Ill, And Points for Doctors
